titleStmt.title: Reasons humbly offer'd to the honourable House of Commons, by the church wardens and other inhabitants of the citty and libertie of Westminster; against passing the bill to exempt apothecaries from serving parish and ward-offices.

notesStmt.note: A petition to the House of Commons, read 4 February 1702.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
This item is the first of two different works numbered '24' at reel C19:1.
